body.name: Milltown Merchants Ladder Shelf - Distressed Bookshelf - Rustic Ladder Bookshelf - Leaning Bookshelf for Rustic Home Decor (Turquoise)
features: MILLTOWN MERCHANTS LADDER BOOKSHELF - The Milltown Merchants dark brown bookshelf comes with a unique rustic finish paired with a clean, modern silhouette. The carefully curated display is great for showcasing photo frames, succulents, art, small house plants, wicker baskets, and books. Create an eye catching display to compliment your unique space with the Milltown Merchants wooden bookshelf!

EASY SETUP / NO TOOLS REQUIRED - The Milltown Merchants leaning bookcase takes just seconds to set up. Line the pegs up on the bottom of the ladder with the holes in the bottom shelf to lock it into place. After the bottom shelf is secured, fold the other 3 shelves down and you are good to go! Reference our unboxing video to see just how easy it is! Each Milltown Merchants folding bookcase features a simple, yet functional design that adds a rustic touch to any item you display.

OPEN BACK SHELVES - Each Milltown Merchants etagere bookcase has simple, clean lines for a rustic take on a modern, minimalist shelving unit. This rustic bookshelf features four graduated shelves for a unique, yet functional space saving bookcase. The Milltown Merchants ladder bookcase is ideal for your decorating and storage needs while maintaining a clean appearance in any room or office.

SOPHISTICATED SILHOUETTE - The sophisticated silhouette of the Milltown Merchants ladder bookshelf blends with any home decor. Our leaning ladder shelf is a great addition to bathrooms, kitchens, foyers, an office space, sunrooms, living rooms, dens, and bedrooms. Add a touch of rustic style to your space with the Milltown Merchants narrow bookcase.

RUSTIC HOME DECOR - The Milltown Merchants open bookshelf has a distressed, one of a kind finish. This farmhouse bookshelf features open shelves which can easily accommodate a wicker basket to stowaway accessories from view for a clean, polished look. The Milltown Merchants leaning shelf is a great alternative to a barrister bookcase, a metal bookcase, a sauder bookcase, or an oak bookcase. (DIMENSIONS: 45.5" L x 16" W x 13.5" H)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: KEY FEATURES SUPERIOR QUALITY Indulge in the unmatched quality of the Milltown Merchants Ladder Bookshelf - a testament to superior craftsmanship. This driftwood bookshelf boasts a distinctive rustic finish harmoniously paired with a sleek, modern silhouette. Precision in design ensures a sturdy and durable structure, allowing you to confidently showcase a curated display of photo frames, succulents, art & more. Our shelf will add style to any room! FUNCTIONAL DESIGN Traditional bookcases can look uninteresting and dry, the Milltown Merchants leaning bookcase adds a sophisticated, yet rustic appeal to any room in your home or office. Each shelf provides ample space for displaying candles, trinkets, and frames without sacrificing real estate. Each folding bookcase features a simple, yet functional design that adds a rustic touch to any item you display. SOPHISTICATED SILHOUETTE The sophisticated silhouette of the Milltown Merchants ladder bookshelf blends with any home decor. Our leaning ladder shelf is a great addition to bathrooms, kitchens, foyers, an office space, sunrooms, living rooms, dens, and bedrooms. Add a touch of rustic style to your space with the Milltown Merchants narrow bookcase and display art, frames and trinkets anywhere! RUSTIC HOME DECOR The Milltown Merchants open bookshelf has a distressed, one of a kind finish. This farmhouse bookshelf features open shelves which can easily accommodate a wicker basket to stowaway accessories from view for a clean, polished look. The Milltown Merchants leaning shelf is a great alternative to a barrister bookcase, a metal bookcase, or a sauder bookcase. You can't go wrong with the simplistic yet sophisticated design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking unit
reviews.reviewText: It looks great, was easy to assemble, very very lightweight. We just made sure we put something heavy on the bottom shelf. We bought the Umber, which is like a dark grayish/brown with a light white wash going through it. It’s exactly what we were looking for and not too expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute as can be!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this cute little shelf to fill in a space in the living room between the front door and double windows. It’s not overpowering but affords shelving to show off anything from books to mementos. It’s not real sturdy but to be put in one place and not be bumped into, it’s fits the purpose

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not the steadiest, but I like it
reviews.reviewText: I use this as part of my display for outdoor markets.PROS:It's lightweight, so carrying it from my car to my spot is easy.It only takes a few seconds to set up, with no tools.It's the perfect size for what I need.CONS:It isn't very steady, so I do have to anchor it to the ground or my tent.Overall, the good outweighs the bad and I'm really happy with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Gave to my son and his fiancé. He said that it looks so lovely. Was easy to set up- literally no assembly required. It just folded right into place instantaneously. We had an issue with the carrier which the merchant was very understanding about and provided 5 star customer service in resolving the delay. Excellent product and merchant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looks cute, but ...
reviews.reviewText: While I love the look of this book case, it isn't solid piece. I'm not really even sure what it is made out of as particle board is usually pretty heavy. It light enough that I can pick it up with just a few fingers. If you have small children or pets, you may find they will easily knock this over. Given its construction, I believe the price point for this is a little high. It comes fully assembled, so if you are worried about that, this is a plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ladder Shelf is great!
reviews.reviewText: The Milltown ladder shelf is perfect for my needs. I use it as a shelf for charging my electronics. The best part was that no assembly was required. Yay!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is perfect.
reviews.reviewText: I bought two, one for each side or our fire place. I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I received my ladder today and it is filthy! In the 1st pic it looks like mold across the back slat, and the side is full of brown dirt - my hands were dirty just from touching it. The shipping box was all torn up (which could be from the delivery service). The 3rd pic shows where the 2 bolts securing the ladder jut out, the manufacturer couldn’t use shorter bolts? It looks tacky and you could easily get snagged on it. I knew before I bought it that it was cheap and not very sturdy, but for its intended purpose that would have been fine were it not for the filthy, gross condition it arrived in so it’s going back. To say I’m disappointed is an understatement because otherwise it was just what I was looking for but instead I’m disgusted. Shame on you Milltown.7/3/23: I would like to amend my review after speaking to Milltown. They were impressively fast in addressing the issue and took full responsibility for the damaged item. They offered to either replace it or issue a full refund. Things happen, I don’t hold it against them especially after the steps they took to remedy the problem, which is somewhat of a rarity these days. Thank you Milltown!
